Class ReadMessages

java.lang.Object
database.repository.Repository<ReadMessages.ReadMessagePivot>
database.repository.repos.ReadMessages
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRepository<ReadMessages.ReadMessagePivot>
public class ReadMessages extends Repository<ReadMessages.ReadMessagePivot>
Repository class for managing read messages.

This class provides methods to interact with the "ReadMessages" table. It supports marking messages as read or unread, finding read messages for a user, and performing basic CRUD operations. The repository uses a pivot model with composite keys for the "userID" and "messageID".

Author:
Dhruv
See Also:

    ReadMessages.ReadMessagePivot

    • getById

      public ReadMessages.ReadMessagePivot getById(int id)
      Retrieves a read message by its ID.

      This method is not supported for the ReadMessages repository as it uses a composite key.

      Specified by:
      getById in interface IRepository<ReadMessages.ReadMessagePivot>
      Overrides:
      getById in class Repository<ReadMessages.ReadMessagePivot>

      Returns:
      The entity corresponding to the provided ID, or null if not found.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - Always thrown for this method.

    • findReadMessages

      public List<Integer> findReadMessages(int userId, List<Integer> messageIds)
      Finds messages that have been read by a specific user from a list of message IDs.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      messageIds - A list of message IDs to check for read status.
      Returns:
      A list of message IDs that have been read by the user.
